# C4 Container Diagram

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

```mermaid
C4Container
    title Container Diagram - SpecWeave Architecture

    Person(user, "User", "Developer or PM")

    System_Boundary(specweave, "SpecWeave System") {
        Container(cli, "CLI", "TypeScript/Commander.js", "Command-line interface for all operations")
        Container(core, "Core Engine", "TypeScript", "Increment lifecycle, hooks, state management")
        Container(sync_svc, "Sync Coordinator", "TypeScript", "Bidirectional sync with external tools")
        Container(import_svc, "Import Pipeline", "TypeScript", "Multi-platform work item import")
        Container(living_docs, "Living Docs Service", "TypeScript", "Documentation lifecycle and ID allocation")
        Container(metrics_svc, "Metrics Service", "TypeScript", "DORA metrics calculation")
        ContainerDb(state, "State Store", "JSON/YAML Files", "Increments, configs, session registry")
        ContainerDb(cache, "Cache", "File System", "24h TTL cache for external data")
    }

    System_Ext(github, "GitHub API", "REST API")
    System_Ext(jira, "Jira API", "REST API v3")
    System_Ext(ado, "ADO API", "REST API")

    Rel(user, cli, "Executes commands")
    Rel(cli, core, "Orchestrates operations")
    Rel(core, sync_svc, "Triggers sync")
    Rel(core, import_svc, "Triggers imports")
    Rel(core, living_docs, "Updates documentation")
    Rel(core, metrics_svc, "Calculates metrics")
    Rel(core, state, "Reads/writes state")
    Rel(sync_svc, cache, "Caches responses")
    Rel(sync_svc, github, "REST calls")
    Rel(sync_svc, jira, "REST calls")
    Rel(sync_svc, ado, "REST calls")
    Rel(import_svc, github, "Fetches issues")
    Rel(import_svc, jira, "Fetches epics/stories")
    Rel(import_svc, ado, "Fetches work items")
```
